attributes.action: Sack Hazel Blears from her cabinet post immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to sack Hazel Blears from her cabinet post forthwith.

further more to refer her conduct regarding her expenses, specially in regards to "flipping" her residences, and the avoidance of CGT on the sale of home, which have been funded by the tax payer.

The prime minister has said her conduct was not acceptable, and her continued post in the cabinet is not acceptable to us.

rejection.details: Hazel Blears resigned her Cabinet post on 3 June 2009.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
